SenderObjects.EmailNotification module¶

class SenderObjects.EmailNotification.EmailNotification¶

Bases: object

The core module of my example project

fafaf[DVC Constructor]

send_email(reciever_email, body, subject)¶

Sends email using the passed in email address (reciever_email) along with the body and subject of the email.

Arguments:

reciever_email {string} – [Email address to be sent to.] body {[type]} – [Body of email that will be attached to email object before sending.] subject {[type]} – [Subject of email that will be attached to email object before sending.]

sender_email¶

This function does something Maybve.

Parameters

  • name (str.) – The name to use.

  • state (bool.) – Current state to be in.

Returns

string – The email address of the host/sender.
